category: Best Actor in a Leading Role

nominations.notes: Sidney Poitier became the first African American to win the Best Actor Oscar and the only one until Denzel Washington for Training Day (2001), 38 years later. By a strange coincidence, Washington won the Best Actor award on the same night when Poitier received an Honorary Oscar.

category: Best Actor in a Supporting Role

nominations.notes: Melvyn Douglas was not present at the awards ceremony. His co-star Brandon De Wilde accepted the award on his behalf.

category: Best Actress in a Leading Role

nominations.notes: Patricia Neal was not present at the awards ceremony. Annabella accepted the award on her behalf.

category: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
